title: Bell, Book, and Murder: The Bast Mysteries
description: Rosemary Edghill cast a keenly observant, friendly, yet faintly amused eye on an intriguing American micro-culture. The Bast novels offer a very new view of the practitioners of a very old faith. Edghill allows that there's still magic in the air.Rosemary Edghill's Bast novels are a real treat. Bell, Book, and Murder contains all three Bast novels, Speak Daggers to Her, Book of Moons , and the first softcover edition of The Bowl of Night (excerpted in USA Today ).
author: Rosemary Edghill
